project_name: AI Model Fine-Tuning with Data Collection and Evaluation
description: The project aimed to fine-tune an AI model through a structured data collection process, followed by evaluation and optimization to improve model performance using custom prompts.

technologies_used.name: AI Model Fine-Tuning
technologies_used.description: Process of refining a pre-existing AI model using specific datasets to enhance its performance and understanding.

technologies_used.name: Data Collection
technologies_used.description: Gathering and processing datasets in a structured manner to support machine learning.

technologies_used.name: Supervised Learning
technologies_used.description: A type of machine learning where the model is trained using labeled data.

technologies_used.name: Data Cleaning
technologies_used.description: The process of removing errors, inconsistencies, and irrelevant data from the dataset.

technologies_used.name: Feature Engineering
technologies_used.description: The creation of new features or transformations of existing features to improve model performance.

technologies_used.name: Model Optimization
technologies_used.description: Techniques used to improve the performance of a model, including quantization for resource optimization.

skills_required.name: Data Collection and Organization
skills_required.description: Expertise in gathering and processing large datasets, ensuring relevance and quality.

skills_required.name: Data Cleaning and Feature Engineering
skills_required.description: Strong skills in cleaning and transforming raw data into structured formats for AI model training.

skills_required.name: AI Model Fine-Tuning
skills_required.description: Experience in fine-tuning large language models using specific libraries and tools to enhance performance.

skills_required.name: Custom Prompt Design
skills_required.description: Ability to craft custom prompt templates to improve model comprehension and outputs.

skills_required.name: Quantization and Model Optimization
skills_required.description: Proficiency in working with quantized models for resource efficiency during training.

skills_required.name: Supervised Learning
skills_required.description: Understanding of supervised learning techniques, particularly with regards to data labeling and structured learning.

outcomes.name: Improved AI Model Performance
outcomes.description: The fine-tuned model showed significant improvements in understanding and matching structured data.

outcomes.name: Custom Prompt Effectiveness
outcomes.description: Custom prompts helped achieve more accurate and contextually relevant outputs.
